summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening, and establishing of MERIDIAN AVENUE NORTH between North Northgate Way and North 112th Street and NORTH NORTHGATE WAY between Burke Avenue North and Corliss Avenue North at existing center line grades; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking, and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, including property or property rights necessary for cut and fill slopes; and providing for payment therefor.
